cast.overview: In the middle of the Los Angeles ghetto, drugs, robberies and shootings dominate everyday life. During these times, Furious tries to raise his son Tre to be a decent person. Tre's friends, on the other hand, have little regard for the law and drag the entire neighborhood into a street war...
cast.title: Boyz n the Hood

details.biography: Kenneth A. Brown was born on August 8, 1979 in Los Angeles, California, USA. He is an actor and director, known for Candyman (1992), Boyz n the Hood (1991) and P.U.N.K.S. (1999).
details.name: Kenneth A. Brown
